typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE as string,
		{xMedia Group} as string,
		{MEDIA TYPE} as string,
		{xMedia Channel} as string,
		{Agency Channel Name} as string,
		{Campaign Name} as string,
		Account as string,
		LOB as string,
		BU as string,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{COUNTRY CODE} as string,
		{COUNTRY NAME} as string,
		REGION as string,
		{xCampaign Quarter} as string,
		{Search Keyword Type} as string,
		{Search Match Type} as string,
		{Emea Region} as string,
		{Emea Sub Region} as string,
		{xAccount Currency} as string,
		Compliant as string,
		{Agency Owner Market} as string,
		{Campaign Scale} as string,
		{Campaign Objective} as string,
		{Media Brief Name} as string,
		{Impression } as string,
		Click as string,
		View as string,
		{Swipe rate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(Compliant = iif(Compliant == "Compliant", "Compliance", "Non-Compliance"),
		{Emea Region} = iif(isNull({Emea Region}), "Unclassified", toString({Emea Region})),
		{Search Match Type} = iif(isNull({Search Match Type}), "Unclassified", toString({Search Match Type})),
		{Emea Sub Region} = iif(isNull({Emea Sub Region}), "Unclassified", toString({Emea Sub Region})),
		{Campaign Scale} = iif(isNull({Campaign Scale}), "Unclassified", toString({Campaign Scale})),
		{Campaign Objective} = iif(isNull({Campaign Objective}), "Unclassified", toString({Campaign Objective})),
		{Search Keyword Type} = iif(isNull({Search Keyword Type}), "Unclassified", toString({Search Keyword Type})),
		{xCampaign Quarter} = iif(isNull({xCampaign Quarter}), "Unclassified", toString({xCampaign Quarter})),
		Year = iif(isNull(at(regexSplit({xCampaign Quarter}, '-'),2)),"2020" , at(regexSplit({xCampaign Quarter}, '-'),1)),
		Quarter = iif(isNull(at(regexSplit({xCampaign Quarter}, '-'),2)),at(regexSplit({xCampaign Quarter}, '-'),1) , at(regexSplit({xCampaign Quarter}, '-'),2)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		SOURCE,
		xMediaGroup = {xMedia Group},
		MEDIATYPE = {MEDIA TYPE},
		xMediaChannel = {xMedia Channel},
		AgencyChannelName = {Agency Channel Name},
		CampaignName = {Campaign Name},
		Account,
		LOB,
		BU,
		PARENTCAMPAIGNNAME = {PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME},
		SUBCAMPAIGNNAME = {SUB CAMPAIGN NAME},
		COUNTRYCODE = {COUNTRY CODE},
		COUNTRYNAME = {COUNTRY NAME},
		REGION,
		xCampaignQuarter = {xCampaign Quarter},
		SearchKeywordType = {Search Keyword Type},
		SearchMatchType = {Search Match Type},
		EmeaRegion = {Emea Region},
		EmeaSubRegion = {Emea Sub Region},
		xAccountCurrency = {xAccount Currency},
		Compliant,
		AgencyOwnerMarket = {Agency Owner Market},
		CampaignScale = {Campaign Scale},
		CampaignObjective = {Campaign Objective},
		MediaBriefName = {Media Brief Name},
		Impression = {Impression },
		Click,
		View,
		Swiperate = {Swipe rate},
		Year,
		Quarter
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: []) ~> sink1
